data.actual_result: The image cropper also zooms into the image
data.expected_result: The image cropper should only rotate the image
data.short_description: Rotating a server icon or avatar using the new image cropper also zooms into it
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server you have permission to change the icon for ("Manage Server" permission) > Settings > Server Settings > Overview or edit your own avatar from User Settings - Tap on the server icon or own avatar - Choose an image to upload - Tap on the rotation icon on the right - Drag the slider to the right - Notice that it also zooms into the image instead of only rotating it
